snippet: A YouTube presentation completed two weeks of events intended to help digital media companies attract money from marketers that might otherwise be spent on television.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column observes that a YouTube presentation in New York completes two weeks of events intended to help digital media companies attract money from marketers that might otherwise be spent on television.
lead_paragraph: A YouTube presentation completed two weeks of events intended to help digital media companies attract money from marketers that might otherwise be spent on television.

headline.seo: YouTube Channels Court Advertisers at NewFronts
headline.main: YouTube and Kin Woo Marketers, Seeking to Siphon Dollars From TV
headline.print_headline: YouTube and Kin Woo Marketers, Seeking to Siphon Dollars From TV
